titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ
titles.en: Chapter 42 – The one who says, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>!’ - ten times

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ حَقّاً حَقّاً
titles.en: Chapter 43 – The one who says, ‘There is no god except for Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, truly, truly’

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ فِي كُلِّ يَوْمٍ أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ إِلَهاً وَاحِداً أَحَداً صَمَداً لَمْ يَتَّخِذْ صَاحِبَةً وَ لَا وَلَداً
titles.en: Chapter 41 – The one says ten timed during every day, ‘I testify that there is no God except Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, Alone, there being no associates for Him<sup>azwj</sup>, One God, First, Last, neither having taken a female companion nor a son’.

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ قَالَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ
titles.en: Chapter 42 – The one who says, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>!’ - ten times

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (12/206)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ أَيُّوبَ بْنِ الْحُرِّ أَخِي أُدَيْمٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: مَنْ قَالَ يَا اللَّهُ يَا اللَّهُ عَشْرَ مَرَّاتٍ قِيلَ لَهُ لَبَّيْكَ مَا حَاجَتُكَ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from his father, from Ayoub Bin Al Hurr, a brother of Adeym,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘The one who says, ‘O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>! O Allah<sup>azwj</sup>!’, ten times, it would be said to him: ‘At your service, what is your need?’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Y ahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from his father from Ayyub ibn al-Hurr brother of ‘Udaym from abu ‘Abd Allah (a.s.) who has said the following: “Whoever says, ‘O Allah, ten times, it will be said to him, ‘ Labbayka ’ (your call for help is well heard and noted). What kind of help do you need?”’
